My friend has the same issue with ET:L after upgrading to Windows 8.1. He is using ET:L 2.71rc3

Well, I expected RC3 to be affected, but I'm more curious about the -git code with Jacker fix.

It also seems that bug is fixed with SDL2:
https://bugzilla.icculus.org/show_bug.cgi?id=6050

This is not an issue with Legacy but an issue how Microsoft changed the way normal input works on Windows 8.1. In essence it causes mouse and keyboard stutter in games which do not use raw input. This is the reason why i enabled raw input on legacy by default (i think i changed it after RC3 :( ).

You can enable raw input on RC3 by setting in_mouse to "3" and doing a in_restart.
Thx Jacker. Saukko confirmed that the in_mouse setting works perfectly. Latest git is also working correctly out of the box. Closing this issue now.
